gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Flows

Class ToRecursiveDerivations

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Flows.Transformation
      • gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Flows.ToRecursiveDerivations
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ToRecursiveDerivations
extends Transformation
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    This class generates derivations from the input term, recursively, until there are no more, or until a cycle is detected.

    History:

    • SCR-15, chlu, 07-23-12, add derivation type options.
    • SCR-20, chlu, 07-23-12, add derivation negation options.
    • SCR-28, chlu, 08-01-12, add derivation negation and type options.
    Version:
    V-2013
    Author:
    NLM NLS Development Team
    See Also:
    Design Document , ToDerivation

    • Method Detail

      • Mutate

        public static java.util.Vector<LexItem> Mutate(LexItem in,
                                               java.sql.Connection conn,
                                               RamTrie trie,
                                               int restrictFlag,
                                               int derivationType,
                                               int derivationNegation,
                                               boolean detailsFlag,
                                               boolean mutateFlag,
                                               boolean detailFlowFlag)
        Performs the mutation of this flow component.
        Parameters:
        in - a LexItem as the input for this flow component
        conn - LVG database connection
        trie - LVG Ram trie
        restrictFlag - a numberical flag to restrict out into LVG_ONLY LVG_OR_ALL, or ALL (defined in OutputFilter).
        derivationType - a numberical flag to restrict derivation type D_TYPE_ZERO, D_TYPE_PREFIX, D_TYPE_SUFFIX, D_TYPE_ZERO_PREFIX, D_TYPE_ZERO_SUFFIX, D_TYPE_PREFIX_SUFFIX, D_TYPE_ALL (defined in OutputFilter);
        derivationNegation - a numberical flag to restrict derivation negation D_NEGATION_OTHERWISE, D_NEGATION_NEGATIVE, D_NEGATION_BOTH
        detailsFlag - a boolean flag for processing details information
        mutateFlag - a boolean flag for processing mutate information
        detailFlowFlag - a boolean flag for showing the flow history in details. For instance use ddd instead of R.
        Returns:
        Vector - results from this flow component
        See Also:
        DbBase, OutputFilter

        Performs the mutation of this flow component.

        in - a LexItem as the input for this flow component
        conn - LVG database connection
        trie - LVG Ram trie
        restrictFlag - a numberical flag to restrict out into LVG_ONLY LVG_OR_ALL, or ALL (defined in OutputFilter).
        detailsFlag - a boolean flag for processing details information
        mutateFlag - a boolean flag for processing mutate information
        detailFlowFlag - a boolean flag for showing the flow history in details. For instance use ddd instead of R.
        Returns:
        Vector - results from this flow component
        See Also:
        DbBase, OutputFilter
